title: A1 Grammar - General Review 1
subject: english
description: General review covering Present Simple, Present Continuous, Past Simple, and Future forms.

questions.explanation: Present Simple for habits. 'I' takes the base form.
Present Continuous for actions happening now. 'It' uses 'is'.
Past Simple: The past form of 'go' is 'went'.

questions.text: We _____ visit our grandparents next week.
questions.explanation: Future Simple with 'will' for future plans.
Present Simple question with 'you' uses 'Do'.

questions.text: They _____ watching TV at the moment.
questions.explanation: Present Continuous: 'They' uses 'are'.

questions.text: He _____ not buy the car last month.
questions.explanation: Past Simple negative uses 'did not' (didn't).

questions.text: I am _____ to buy a new phone soon.
questions.explanation: Future with 'be going to' for plans.
Present Simple: Third person singular (he) adds 's'.
Past Simple of 'be': 'You' uses 'were'.
Present Continuous: The action is happening right now.

questions.text: We _____ happy to see you last night.
questions.explanation: Past Simple of 'be' with 'We' is 'were'.
Future prediction often uses 'will'.
Present Simple routine: She does.
Present Continuous question starts with 'Are' for 'they'.

questions.text: I _____ a sad movie last Sunday.
questions.explanation: Past Simple regular verb adds '-ed'.

questions.text: What are you _____ to do tonight?
questions.explanation: Future structure: 'What are you going to do?'
Present Simple negative for 'he' uses 'does not'.
Past Simple question: 'Did' + base verb (eat).
Future: Spontaneous decision uses 'will'.
